title: An Ordinary Night - Novel Updates
tags: Betrayal   Kidnappings   Love Triangles   Modern Day   Oneshot   Reincarnation   Revenge   Seme Protagonist   Thriller   Transmigration
author: 林与珊
description:
Xin Yi and Ke Han had grown up together, but later Xin Yi was indirectly killed by Ke Han. Ke Han liked Xin Yi’s boyfriend, Sheng Fan, and used a secretly filmed video to threaten him into dating him.

* This is a 3-hour story about being reborn and exacting revenge>
